channel.title: Shopping Feed
channel.description: Mewlena.com Google Shopping Data Feed XML

item.g:title: Spiritual Butterfly Blanket
item.g:description: Spiritual Butterfly Blanket is custom-made-to-order and handcrafted to the highest quality standards.*Each blanket features a premium suede polyester print for beautiful color vibrancy.*Cozy underside is constructed from an ultra-soft micro fleece fabric to keep you warm and comfortable.*Perfect for snuggling while watching TV on the couch, relaxing on a sofa, or reading in bed.*Machine washable with cold water gentle cycle and mild detergent.
